aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: I am a recent Computer Science graduate specializing in Web Development. With a strong foundation in full-stack development, I also have a keen interest in AI and Data Science. I am passionate about leveraging my diverse skill set to contribute to innovative and impactful projects.

experience.title: Experience

insparkForgeDescription.line1: During my end-of-studies internship, I developed Inspark Forge, a talent-job matching and career-tracking application. The project was awarded the title of 'Best Project in the Department'.
insparkForgeDescription.line2: Implemented skill evaluation with OpenAI's generative AI for personalized recommendations.
insparkForgeDescription.line3: Integrated authentication and authorization using Keycloak.
insparkForgeDescription.line4: Developed a recommendation system using NLP for job matching.
insparkForgeDescription.line5: Created a real-time notification system with WebSockets and RabbitMQ.
insparkForgeDescription.line6: Utilized NX for a monorepo Angular application, enhancing reusability.
insparkForgeDescription.line7: Designed a scalable microservices architecture with Spring Boot.
insparkForgeDescription.line8: Applied DDD principles for maintainable architecture.
insparkForgeDescription.line9: Created a multi-language application for diverse users.
insparkForgeDescription.line10: Managed file and image storage in Azure.

experience.cniDescription: Developed a full-stack web app to streamline project management tasks
experience.uibDescription: Extensively observed financial transactions and account management.

workoutBuddy.description: A MERN project with JWT for logging exercises, tracking workout history, and monitoring progress.

insparkForge.description: A talent-job matching and career-tracking application with OpenAI's generative AI for personalized Skill Evaluation and Nlp for an efficient recommendation system.

simonGame.description: A simple Simon Game built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

productsManager.description: A full-stack project with Angular and Spring Boot for managing products.

contact.description: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message.
